attributes.action: Tell the British taxpayer from where has he borrowed the £500bn & at what rate of interest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PM has not told the taxpayers of this country from where or  whom, he has borrowed the £500bn. Nor has he stated the rate of interest to be paid ,over what period of time. Being a democracy and having borrowed this money on behalf of the British people,I think we are entitled to know these facts - WHAT IS THE BIG SECRET ?
